item.title: Serverless Machine Learning Module 1
item.description: 05/10/2022 Lab 1 Serverless Machine Learning #machinelearning #course #hopsworks #serverless #gradio We’re looking at lab 1 of the Serverless-ML course today. Make sure to check out their website and their Github repository and give them a star! A link to my fork of the repo is here if you wish to follow along with my notebooks! Introduction Following on from Module 0 labs we are now going to look into deploying an actual machine learning product to the web!
